name: Yellow Lines SS Chairman Shirt
description: The Chairman Shirt is named so after Chairman Mao Zedong, a 20th century Chinese revolutionary who was often depicted in an overcoat with white collar peeping just above. That white collar has since become known as the 'Mandarin collar', a clean and simple alternative to the well-known Western pointed collar. We are proud to present our carefully crafted, more casual edition of our ever-popular Chairman Shirt. In honing this design, we removed the darts for a slightly relaxed fit, and returned to a traditional Western take on button-holing, placing them vertically. The garment offers a clean, modern, unadulterated aesthetic; reminiscent of the old school approach to resort-wear, and engineered to add some class to your summer wardrobe. ≡ Mandarin collar ≡ 100% cotton ≡ Complementary genuine wooden buttons ≡ Clean, contemporary aesthetic ≡ Looser, slightly more casual summer fit Model is 6'2" (1.88cm), and wears a medium Chairman Shirt.

name: Village Chairman Shirt
description: The Chairman Shirt is named so after Chairman Mao Zedong, a 20th century Chinese revolutionary who was often depicted in an overcoat with white collar peeping just above. That white collar has since become known as the 'Mandarin collar', a clean and simple alternative to the well-known Western pointed collar. This is our interpretation of such a shirt. We've added darts in the back to ensure a tidy fit and horizontal button holes for ease of neck-fit and general mobility. We've subtracted the usual placket found on button-ups, to ensure the most simple and perfect aesthetic. ≡ Mandarin collar ≡ 100% Cotton ≡ Horizontal button holes ≡ Contrasting black buttons ≡ Clean, classic fitted cut Model is 6'2" (1.88cm), and wears a medium Chairman Shirt.

name: Initiation Tee
description: THE (adjective) Denoting one or more people or things are assumed to be common knowledge. e.g. “What’s the matter?” or “Call the doctor.” LUCID (adjective) 1) Expressed clearly; easy to understand. e.g. “A clear and lucid style.” 2) Showing ability to think clearly, especially in the intervals between confusion or insanity. COLLECTIVE (noun) Done by people acting as a group. e.g. “A protesting collective.” We are The Lucid Collective. We believe in never compromising our principles. Of those principles, loyalty is one of the most profound. From the very establishment of this clothing outfitters in our minds we were determined to create the most aesthetically pleasing, high-quality garments possible. This saw innumerable challenges arise in our conception, all of which we scaled, if only for the loyalty we held to providing the most premium product to our eventual customers. In doing so, each of our customers has transcended the bounds of the purchaser of our products and become a member of our family. This is a limited edition run of classic-fit tees. Join the family. ≡ Woven front label ≡ 100% premium organic cotton; you'll be the softest thug on the block. Model is 6'2" (1.88cm), and wears a large Initiation Tee.

name: Aristotle Tee
description: Aristotle lived some 2,000 years ago. Yet, by no mere feat of chance, the man's name lives on. He was taught by Plato who himself was taught by Socrates. And, in turn, Aristotle turned his hand and taught Alexander the Great. We thought his legend deserved some shirt space. ≡ Woven sleeve label ≡ Made of 100% organic cotton, so you can properly rep the guy who taught your great great great granddad morals. Model is 6'2" (1.88cm), and wears a large Aristotle Tee.

name: Roman Cap
description:
We can't claim Picasso with this one, but we can claim serious streetwear art.

No two hats are the same, due to the unpredictable nature of the unique print.

≡ Cotton spandex mix fabric for unique fit
≡ Fused lining
≡ Logical Eye silver foil embossed on to black New Zealand leather.
≡ Black leather back-strap with brass buckle
≡ Nickel eyelets
≡ Constructed by hand in New Zealand

name: Navy Picnic Cap
description:
We stumbled across this fabric in a tucked-away store with a fading sign.

Imagined as any other garment than a five-panel struck us as a waste of the truly cheerful old-school feel to the pattern.

We've contrasted the navy check pattern with a reverse beige check upper bill - yet maintained the navy for the under bill. All of this culminates into a pretty spectacular hat.

≡ 100% cotton
≡ Fused lining
≡ Brass Eyelets
≡ Premium leather badge embossed with the Logical Eye
≡ Leather back-strap with brass buckle
≡ Constructed by hand in New Zealand.

name: Navy Beanie
description:
A king has his crown. Abraham Lincoln had his top-hat. The Godfather had his fedora.

If history has taught us anything, it's that proper headgear is integral to how you present yourself in society.

Our navy colourway, for a more subtle accessory.

≡ 100% Arcylic body, made in USA
≡ 100% Leather reversible cuff, sourced and embossed in New Zealand
